alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 1:05PM MST until December 15 at 8:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...SNOWY AND WINDY CONDITIONS CONTINUE... .Gusty winds and snow will produce difficult travel conditions this afternoon and evening over portions of western and south central South Dakota, the Black Hills, and northeastern Wyoming. Falling and blowing snow will cause reduced visibility and slippery road conditions as the snow gradually moves from west to east across the area. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Falling and blowing snow. Snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Perkins County, the Northern Meade County Plains, Ziebach County and Haakon County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Haakon; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Ziebach
